body.plain:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for your message. At the moment, I don’t have any openings for new clients. I’d be happy to add you to my waitlist (12+ months waiting time) and reach out as soon as a spot becomes available.

Let me know if that works for you.

Best,
Julia
body.html:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for your message. At the moment, I don’t have any openings for new clients. I’d be happy to add you to my waitlist and reach out as soon as a spot becomes available.

Let me know if that works for you.

Best,
Julia
